list_definition.definition: an arm-like part of a tree

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He cut some branches off the oak tree.

list_definition.definition: an offshoot from the main part (of a business, railway/railroad etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: There isn’t a branch of that store in this town
(also adjective) That train runs on the branch line.

list_definition.definition: (usually with out/off) to spread out like, or into, a branch or branches

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The road to the coast branches off here.
